JOB DESCRIPTION: Key Responsibilities      Actively contribute to efforts to implement new PLM solutions or to the upgrademaintenance of existing apps   Take part in the configurationintegration of essential components of the selected solution   Handle the design, development or modification of user interfaces (UI) and implement a comprehensive testing plan   Proceed with the installation of development environments required for project completion      Your Profile          Bachelor s degree in software engineering or other equivalent training   Minimum 5 years of relevant experience with JavaJ2EE in a PLM environment   Excellent oral and written communication skills, including in English   Ability to travel for work purposes      What we can offer you              Flexibility and work from home policy   International teamwork collaboration   Work closely with executive management   Have a positive impact within the organisation   Possibility to work abroad with international clients
